search.helptext: You have not searched for anything yet, all users and recipes are shown below.

upload.signin_message: You need to be signed in to be able to upload recipes.

welcome.message: {{appname}} has a new look and functionality! You can now create an account and upload and edit your recipes yourself. Soon there will be features such as creating lists and following your friends' lists with recipes.
welcome.title: Welcome to {{framework}}
